alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Northwest Highlands; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 9:21PM MST until January 01 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Highlands, Chuska Mountains, West Central Mountains and West Central Plateau. * WHEN...Until Noon MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. This includes along portions of I-40.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Northwest Highlands; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
